CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
JUDGES: Marko Bošnjak;Vincent A. De Gaetano;Georges Ravarani
TEXT: 3. The applicant was born in 1967 and lives in Budapest.
4. He complained of the excessive length of civil proceedings which lasted six years and four months (between 26 November 2007 and 2 April 2014) for two levels of jurisdiction.
